page.title: 17SOCIAL LIFE IN DEEPCAR
page.content: {EVENTS. Deepcar Gala}is held at Parsonage Farm on Fathers' Day and is organised by 3 local groups: Deepcar Village Hall, Deepcar Amenities Association and the 3rd. Stocksbridge Scout Troop.{St. John's Church}have decorated floats going around the steets of Deepcar before their Gala in June. The{Scout Troop}country fayre and sheep roast is held in the Donfield. A fun run is organised by the{Pacesetters Running Club. Deepcar {Amenities Association}organise a firework display and Christmas carol concert and local junior school children entertain senior citizens. Prior to Christmas, Deepcar Amenities Association arrange for a decorated sleigh carrying Father Christmas, to parade the streets of Deepcar with followers singing carols.
